notify_kodi_on_cluster_change.command: sh ~/.raptiformica.d/modules/raptiformica-notify-kodi/lazy_kodictl.sh notify raptiformica "$HOSTNAME detected a cluster change"

notify_kodi_on_start_instance.command: sh ~/.raptiformica.d/modules/raptiformica-notify-kodi/lazy_kodictl.sh notify raptiformica "$HOSTNAME booted a new machine"

notify_kodi_on_slave_instance.command: sh ~/.raptiformica.d/modules/raptiformica-notify-kodi/lazy_kodictl.sh notify raptiformica "$HOSTNAME finished slaving a machine"

notify_kodi_on_meshnet_deploy.command: sh ~/.raptiformica.d/modules/raptiformica-notify-kodi/lazy_kodictl.sh notify raptiformica "$HOSTNAME connected a new machine to the mesh"

notify_kodi_on_meshnet_join.command: sh ~/.raptiformica.d/modules/raptiformica-notify-kodi/lazy_kodictl.sh notify raptiformica "$HOSTNAME joined the meshnet"
